item.title: Create Repo For Hugo On GitHub
item.description: What you will learn In this document, I’ll show how to create your own website using Hugo, a template, and GitHub pages. I struggled setting up my very first page and was thankful for getting help on the setup. I want to share my experience and help you create the infrastructure for your own website. Requirements The editor of my choice is Visual Studio Code. There are plugins for almost everything i.
